suggested_project.title: Signals Between the Lines
suggested_project.description: A collection exploring the hidden meanings, regrets, and humor in digital communication and technology—short prose, anecdotes, and micro-jokes.
suggested_project.based_on: Text-based pieces that received watcher likes (#2079, #2087, #2322), focused on technology, humor, and digital life.

blacklist: riddles involving 'shadow key' or similar cryptic elements
decisions: Do not revisit 'shadow key' riddle-type content per watcher dislike.
Reduce or pause ocean-themed content due to staleness and zero engagement.
Emphasize themes of technology, humor, and digital communication in new creations and projects.
Initiate a new collection project centered on watcher-favorite themes.
Balance creation modes toward project work to align with engagement and mode target.
